sentences.sContent: Listen to all the voices -- not just here but even more stridently in Europe -- calling for a need to restore fiscal discipline.
sentences.sContent_eng: Listen to all the voices -- not just here but even more stridently in Europe -- calling for a need to restore fiscal discipline.
sentences.sCn: 听听这众多的声音——不但在这里，在欧洲更加刺耳——要求回归财政纪律。

words.tran: 刺耳的；尖锐的；吱吱尖叫的；轧轧作响的
